features: Caffeine free diuretic: Diurex Max provides prompt and effective*, caffeine-free bloat relief whatever time of day you need it
Maximum-strength relief: Diurex Max contains maximum-strength relief in every single-caplet dose
Feel better & less heavy: Diurex Max Water Pills help you get rid of periodic water bloat so you can start feeling better, faster
body.description: You’re doing all the right things to get rid of periodic water weight like avoiding salty foods and staying active. DIUREX Max can help by promptly getting rid of the water weight so you can feel better, faster. Diurex Water Pills work by increasing urination to help rid your body of excess water. Frequent bathroom trips mean Diurex is doing its job, so make sure to stay hydrated and use Diurex water pills as directed on the packaging. DIUREX Max Caffeine-Free Water Pills contain the maximum-strength dose of a safe and effective* caffeine-free diuretic for prompt relief from the uncomfortable and heavy feelings of periodic water bloat. *When used as directed

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: How to use STEP 1 Take Diurex Follow the instructions on the packaging to safely and effectively relieve your excess water weight. STEP 2 Drink plenty of water Diurex increases urination to rid your body of excess water. Frequent bathroom trips are normal. Make sure to replenish by drinking plenty of water so you stay healthily hydrated! STEP 3 Repeat as directed Continue taking Diurex as directed on the package until your periodic water bloat symptoms subside.
Diurex is available in a number of varieties to offer you the relief you need, according to your lifestyle. Use the chart below to find the right fit for you!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 16, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Caffeine free, bloating free!
reviews.reviewText: This diuretic is now a regular part of my medication routine. I take 1 in the AM, and it noticeably makes me feel lighter and sheds some of my water weight. I recommend drinking as much water as possible, or it can be rather dehydrating. I notice a difference when I do not take it, which means it works! Just add it to your cart.

reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Works to an extent
reviews.reviewText: It is tough to tell if it’s directly helping, but I do notice that it soo sometimes help with bloating in my hands. It is necessary to drink enough water with these, so please remember that!

reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars This stuff really works!
reviews.reviewText: I experienced zero side effects. Great product! Even made the swelling in my knee go down! I have what I believe to be arthritis and I did not need an ice pack today! For me, that is progress!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 24, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great product for multiple reasons! Caffeine free is better IMO
reviews.reviewText: Disclaimer: I am NOT a doctor so please check with your doctor first before use! Okay so I love diurex; my roommate & I both use it for different reasons. I have edema (severe water retention) of both legs, my roommate has high blood pressure. Be very careful with this if you have low blood pressure, fyi! Anyway, it helps my legs stay normal and it lowers my roommate's blood pressure but also BE SURE to take a POTASSIUM CHLORIDE supplement and get some ELECTROLYTES too as water loss also means loss of potassium & sodium so we both take a potassium supplement as your body NEEDS it to function properly. That being said, it's very useful for both water retention & high blood pressure. AGAIN, TALK TO YOUR DOCTOR BEFORE USING THIS. This is just my experience & my roommate's with it; we both see it as helpful. Be sure to eat something & also drink lots of water with it which sounds stupid but when your body is retaining water, it's because it thinks your body needs more water which is why it holds on to water in the wrong ways which cause bloating, cramps, etc. So if you take this AND drink water, you'll feel and look better because your body will not retain water, knowing that it's being hydrated as the diurex releases that bloating. I'm not sure why it lowers blood pressure almost immediately but it does. Just be careful if you have normal blood pressure because low blood pressure can also be quite dangerous. Potassium and water with electrolytes along with this is my go to the ease my edema effectively but everyone is different! Also, I much prefer this over the kind with caffeine in it. I don't feel that the caffeine is necessary for me as I get that with my morning coffee, so that just depends on your preference.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 3, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars These made me extremely sick!!!
reviews.reviewText: I bought these because I was having about 20 pounds of water retention from baterial lung infection and it cause my hips legs and ankles to really. I started taking these yesterday, I already don't think I will they will be working. I only took two yesterday. I took one in the morning and one after dinner, I didn't take any afternoon ones because I wanted to see what the two would do for me. However, I did drink fluids throughtout the day. Well, I am still waiting to go to sleep because I never went to sleep last night because I was up all night long throwing up. Just the two pills made me so sick ! It threw my balance off. I could hardly walk.
I like this product and would recommend it. It arrived in record time.
So hard to get where I'm from. These are the best for water retention and I see and fell a difference within hours. Don't need a lot. Only take 2-3 when needed for bloating. Last a long time
I have used other water pills with lower prices and better results. I won't buy it again.
